title: Add email and password input fields

requirements.text: Add email and password input fields to the login interface to support credential-based authentication alongside Internet Identity

quotes: add space for password and email

acceptanceCriteria: Email input field is present with appropriate validation (valid email format)
Password input field is present with masked input for security
Input fields are styled consistently with the existing warm neutral design aesthetic
Fields are positioned logically within the login flow

requirements.text: Store and manage email and password credentials in the backend user profile system

quotes: add space for password and email

acceptanceCriteria: User profile schema includes email field
Password is securely hashed before storage
Backend provides methods to validate credentials during authentication

constraints: Maintain existing Internet Identity authentication as the primary method
Follow existing ProfileSetupModal pattern for collecting user information
Use the warm neutral color scheme (beige, charcoal, soft gold) defined in the design system
nonGoals: Removing or replacing Internet Identity authentication
